sentences.sContent: We tried to stop the flames from spreading, but we knew it was hopeless.
sentences.sCn: 我们试图阻止火势蔓延，但我们知道这是不可能的。

sentences.sContent: Getting your work published often seems a hopeless task .
sentences.sCn: 想让自己的作品出版似乎总是徒劳的。

sentences.sContent: I kept on struggling forward, even though I knew it was hopeless .
sentences.sCn: 虽然知道无望，我还是奋力挣扎向前。

words.tran: 绝望地；无望地；无可救药地

trans.tranOther: if something that you try to do is hopeless, there is no possibility of it being successful
